com.ucloud.ufile.http.request.body

类 UploadFileRequestBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • okhttp3.RequestBody

  • public class UploadFileRequestBody
extends UploadRequestBody<java.io.File>
    上传文件请求体，用于拦截上传进度进行回调
